params._applications: Indexes of the applications to accept.

params._reward: Wanted rewards for completing the task.

params._budget: Maximum ERC20 rewards that can be earned by completing the task.
params._deadline: Block timestamp at which the task expires if not completed.

returns.taskId: Id of the newly created task.

params._submission: Index of the submission that is reviewed.

params._application: Index of application you made that has been accepted.

acceptApplications(uint256,uint16[]).notice: Accept application to allow them to take the task.

getTask(uint256).notice: Retrieves all task information by id.

refundTask(uint256).notice: Refund a task. This can be used to close a task and receive back the budget.

takeTask(uint256,uint16).notice: Take the task after your application has been accepted.

taskCount().notice: Retrieves the current amount of created tasks.
